properties.name: mettbot.bot.name
properties.description: The Telegram username of the bot.

properties.name: mettbot.bot.apitoken
properties.description: The API token for authentication with the Telegram API.

properties.name: mettbot.bot.webhook
properties.description: The URL to which Telegram should POST updates.

properties.name: mettbot.owner
properties.description: Telegram User ID of the bot's owner.

properties.name: mettbot.group
properties.description: The Telegram group that Mettbot should serve.
